title: Bud Lite and Viagra!
body:
https://i.imgur.com/LUX9KN7l.png

You want to talk to your doctor if there are unwanted side effects with taking Viagra and drinking. Overall, it's not so bad though and on the DL it can be really amazing. If drinking Bud Lite wasn't enough of a good time, taking Viagra makes things just that much better. Personally, I learned from Locodoco that taking Viagra increases my hand eye coordination and decision making while playing League. Loco always tells his players to take Viagra. It's the worst kept secret in the Pro Scene.
